listitem.para:
From the following, download the anyframe-sample-properties.zip file that includes sample codes, and decompress the file.
Maven-based run
After moving to the extraction folder in the Command window, check the result of executing the 'mvn compile exec:java -Dexec.mainClass=...' command. Refer to JavaDoc of Main class included in each Eclipse project.
Eclipse-based run
After importing the extraction project from Eclipse, select Main.java under org/anyframe/sample/properties of the src/main/java folder, and click Run As > Java Application on the context menu by clicking on the right button of the mouse. Then check the result.
